Package mastergl.pdp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StateChangeableVibrator
    Interface which offers the only methods a StateDirectionsHandler must use, which are vibrations methods and changing state method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AwayFromPathState
    Class extends StateDirectionsHandler and override the whatabout method to handles actions when the user is away from the path.
    BlueAdapterConfig
    this class is made to initialize the blueAdpater.
    BlueDevicesDialogFrag
    this is the class who shows us a dialog the dialog contains the listView of all the devices in the BTArrayAdapter when we select an item, we launched a Client the constructor should be called after the method BlueAdapterConfig.find() if we want to search new devices Otherwise we'll have the paired devices
    BuildConfig  
    Client
    this class provides us all we need to instanciate the client the client supposed to connect to the server we need to call start after we instantiate the Client the method start is implemented in the upper class of Client this method will launch the thread one thread will execute the method run() and another one will continue the execution
    ClientMock
    Created by Florian on 03/04/2016.
    ClientServerManageData
    this is the class who is in charged of the managing the datas this is where we get the input and the output of the socket all the exchange between two devices should use this class we instantiate this class after The Client or the the Server we need to call start() to run the thread of this class
    ClientServerManageDataMock
    Created by Florian on 03/04/2016.
    ClientServices
    this class run a client this is where we launch the thread by this way, we execute in background some tasks
    InitialState
    Initial state of the application.
    JsonParserUtility
    This class provides utility to get a json file from url, and stock the Json object in members.
    JsonParserUtilityTest
    Created by alaguitard on 04/03/16.
    LastState
    Class which handle the very last of the way, when the next point is the last one.
    LaunchServices
    this class is for the services that the client and the server needs both this class is extended by ServerSevices and ClientServices
    MainActivity
    Test activity.
    MapActivity
    Activity which handle maps, directions and location.

    RandomNumber
    Created by Florian on 22/03/2016.
    RoundAboutState
    Class which handles actions when users has to walk through a roundabout.
    Server
    Created by ouaraka on 04/02/2016
    ServerMock
    Created by Florian on 03/04/2016.
    ServerServices
    this class run a server this is where we launched the thread by this way, we execute in background some tasks
    ServerTest
    Created by Florian on 03/04/2016.
    StateDirectionsHandler
    Abstract class managing state of the way.
    StateDirectionsHandlerTest  
    StraightState
    That class handles actions when the next move is to go straight.
    SynchroActivity
    Test activity of the synchro activity.
    TestLog
    This class is a singleton.
    ToLeftState
    Class handle actions when the next move is to turn left.
    ToRightState
    Class handle actions when the next move is to turn right.
    WayManager
    This class is meant to be a handler for parsing json file and drawing the way on a map.
    WayManagerTest
    This class tests WayManager methods.
    WrongDirectionState
    Class which actions when the user is in the wrong directions.
